'''Jakob''' "'''JahKob'''" '''Porsér''' is a co-founder of [[Mojang Studios]] and was a game designer at Mojang until he left the company along with [[Markus Persson]] and [[Carl Manneh]] on November 6, 2014. Jakob is credited as lead designer on ''[[Caller's Bane]]'', Mojang's second major project. Jakob has since stepped down as Lead Designer of the project to be replaced by [[Måns Olson]].<ref>http://scrollsdev.tumblr.com/post/75801791192/team-changes</ref>

== Games ==
* ''[[Minecraft]]'' 
* ''Four Seasons''
* ''Bejewled 2''

* ''Word Seance''
* ''Bomp Bomp''
* ''Bacteria Hysteria''
* ''[[Caller's Bane]]''
